physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features double storey building on elevated ground. To the left of the photograph
 there is a stairway leading up to the building. The building has tiled pitch roofs as well as a tower at its middle. The tower has domed shaped windows near its roof.
